p.s: In the following analysis I will analizeanalyze the use of stylistic devices in the Blogblog Globalised Environmental Pollution - Causes and Effects by Ankita Mitra.
When we take a look at the structure first, we can see that the text is structured in Paragraphsparagraphs and each have different amount of lines.
In the text we can find lots of Enumerationsenumerations.
In l. 6 no man, no ... the author underlines how important the planet is with aan enumeration.
She wants to express that every life couldn't be without the earth.
Another enumeration the author used is in the next line, l. 7 oxygen, nitrogen ....
With the listing of the components of the Biospherebiosphere, she wants to highlight that we need many Elementselements to live and we shouldn't destroy one of them.
Some communicative strategies we can find are in l. 15 and in l. 36.

In l. 15 at the cost of our health and in l. 24-25 The water we drink... Ankita Mitra writewrites the sentences that we are get involved in the pollution, because our water is contaminated and it is dangerous for our health.
She wants to reach that we are gonnagoing to be more active and that we help us self and other people.
In the last line l. 36 If we fail to restore ... we can maybe see the most important sentence in her blog.
With this sentence she wants that we think about what can happen and that we get afraid of this.
All in all Ankita Mitra writewrites her text very hard, because she wants, that we are active.
She says that the pollution involves us too and not only the person in africaAfrica or something.
